extDescription.message: This extension allows you to select variants of A/B testing by the Google Optimize.

labelClear.message: Are you sure you want to clear all saved Experiments?

helpStep1.message: First, open the "Details" tab on the the Google Optimize page displaying a experient.

helpStep2.message: The Optimize AB Selector parse the test configuration from this page. When the parsing is completed successfully, the Optimize AB Selector icon will display a "!" mark.

helpStep3.message: Click the Optimize AB Selector icon to display a parsed test configuration. Click a URL on the Editor Page to open a page where you are running a test.

helpStep4.message: You can change a pattern on the test page. Select a pattern you want to change and click the Apply button.
